| History                 = The '''Geheime Staatspolizei''' was the official secret police of Nazi Germany and its occupied territories.

Some of their plans included the invasion of Poland, which was thanks to the Destroyer not accomplished,{{r|All Winners Comics #7}} the attempt to defeat the Destroyer,{{r|All Winners Comics #5}} or the assassination attempt at government official Reginald Whitney.{{r|Captain America Comics #10}}
